coreAttributes.name: plug thong
coreAttributes.description: A thong with an integrated metal plug instead of a back, designed to be inserted into someone's anus while wearing.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the thong, before pulling it up to cover [npc.her] private parts and [npc.verb(push)] the butt plug into [npc.her] [npc.asshole+]..
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the thong up [npc2.namePos] [npc2.legs] to cover [npc2.her] private parts and [npc.verb(push)] the butt plug into [npc2.namePos] [npc2.asshole+].
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the thong up [npc2.namePos] [npc2.legs] to cover [npc2.her] private parts and firmly [npc.verb(hold)] [npc2.name] still as [npc.she] roughly [npc.verb(force)] the butt plug into [npc2.her] [npc2.asshole+].

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the butt plug out from [npc.her] [npc.asshole+], [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] thong down and [npc.verb(kick)] it off [npc.her] [npc.feet].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the butt plug out from [npc2.namePos] [npc2.asshole+], [npc.verb(slide)] down [npc2.namePos] thong and [npc.verb(pull)] it off [npc2.her] [npc2.feet].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] firmly [npc.verb(grab)] [npc2.namePos] butt plug and [npc.verb(yank)] it out of [npc2.her] [npc2.asshole+], then roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] thong and [npc.verb(yank)] it off [npc2.her] [npc2.feet].
